```{r}
w <- 6; n <- 9;
p_grid <- seq(from=0,to=1,length.out=100)
posterior <- dbinom(w,n,p_grid)*dunif(p_grid,0,1)
posterior <- posterior/sum(posterior)
 
plot(x = p_grid, y = posterior, type = 'o')
```
